00034 class IFunctionBlock {
00035 public:
00036         IFunctionBlock(brics_3d::WorldModel* wmHandle){
00037                 this->wm = wmHandle;
00038         };
00039         virtual ~IFunctionBlock(){};
00040 
00041         virtual void configure(brics_3d::ParameterSet parameters) = 0;
00042 
00043         virtual void setData(std::vector<unsigned int>& inputDataIds) {
00044                 this->inputDataIds = inputDataIds;
00045         }
00046         virtual void execute() = 0;
00047 
00048         virtual void getData(std::vector<unsigned int>& newDataIds) {
00049                 newDataIds = this->outputDataIds;
00050         }
00051 
00052
